references.paper_title: Objectron: A large scale dataset of object-centric videos in the wild with pose annotations
references.reason: It provides a large-scale dataset crucial for training and evaluating the proposed model, addressing the limitation of existing datasets for natural videos.
It provides a comprehensive overview of self-supervised learning methods, which forms the context for the novel straightening method proposed in the paper.

references.paper_title: VICReg: Variance-Invariance-Covariance Regularization For Self-Supervised Learning
references.reason: It introduces a self-supervised learning objective function used for comparison and demonstrates a useful regularization technique that is extended in the current paper.

references.paper_title: A simple framework for contrastive learning of visual representations
references.reason: It's a foundational paper in contrastive learning, a major category of self-supervised learning methods that is used as a baseline comparison in the paper

references.paper_title: solo-learn: A Library of Self-supervised Methods for Visual Representation Learning
references.reason: It provides a comprehensive library of self-supervised learning methods used as baselines for comparison, enabling a fair evaluation of the proposed method.
